      • unescapePathComponent

        private static String unescapePathComponent(String name)
        Convert a path component that contains backslash ecape sequences to a literal string. This is necessary when you want to explicitly refer to a path that contains globber metacharacters.

      • getPathComponents

        private static List<String> getPathComponents(String path)
                                       throws IOException
        Translate an absolute path into a list of path components. We merge double slashes into a single slash here. POSIX root path, i.e. '/', does not get an entry in the list.
        Throws:
        IOException
